mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_OWNER_PROFILE (BOOK_OWNER_ID, NICKNAME, FAVORITE_BOOKS, FAVORITE_AUTHORS, FAVORITE_GENRES) VALUES (#{bookOwnerId}, #{nickname}, #{favoriteBooks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{favoriteAuthors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{favoriteGenres,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_OWNER_PROFILE SET NICKNAME = #{nickname}, FAVORITE_BOOKS = #{favoriteBooks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAVORITE_AUTHORS = #{favoriteAuthors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAVORITE_GENRES = #{favoriteGenres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE BOOK_OWNER_ID = #{bookOwnerId}
mapper.select: SELECT P.*, U.NAME AS BOOK_OWNER_NAME FROM BOOK_OWNER_PROFILE P JOIN USERS U ON P.BOOK_OWNER_ID = U.ID WHERE P.BOOK_OWNER_ID = #{bookOwnerId} AND U.DELETED_AT IS NULL
